column5: Located in historical East Dallas, this upstairs garage apartment/guest house has a private entrance and outdoor sitting area. It's conveniently located to many diverse restaurants and eclectic shopping areas. Inside you will find everything you need. Full kitchen with refrigerator, stove, microwave, dishwasher, coffeemaker, cooking utensils, and place settings for four. Bath has claw-foot tub with shower, a washer/dryer. Semi-private bedroom with queen bed and dresser.
column8: Cozy Upstairs One Bedroom with Tree Top Views
